places.shoppingCenters: Within walking distance from the residential complex is located a modern shopping and entertainment center - Alfraganus Mall. This is a stylish urban space where boutiques, gastronomic concepts, supermarket, recreation areas and children's playgrounds are gathered. It's pleasant to spend weekends here, take shopping breaks or enjoy evening walks in the atmosphere of comfort and dynamics of a big city
places.parksDetail: The residential complex is surrounded by green areas that create a sense of natural balance in the urban environment. Just a few minutes away - Furqat Park, a cozy space for leisurely walks and family recreation. Five minutes by car - Ecopark, a new format landscape park with bike paths, activity zones and thoughtful eco-environment. Also nearby is Mirzo Ulugbek Park (former Telman Park) - a quiet, green place loved by all children
places.marketsDetail: The residential complex is located surrounded by diverse commercial infrastructure. Five minutes by car - Rice Market with a wide selection of fresh products. Just 10 minutes away you can reach Mirobod Market - one of the oldest and most popular markets in Tashkent, where traditions, quality and color are combined. And just a two-minute walk away is the Korzinka supermarket, which offers food and everyday goods
places.schoolsDetail: Within walking distance - State Academic Bolshoi Theater named after Alisher Navoi. This is the main stage of Uzbekistan, where world-class operas, ballets and concerts take place - an important cultural advantage for living in the city center
places.entertainmentDetail: Just a couple of minutes by car - and you are on Taras Shevchenko Street, one of the gastronomic centers of the capital. Here are concentrated the best restaurants, coffee shops, author gastrobars, wine boutiques and confectioneries. The street lives in the rhythm of the city and is perfect for both business meetings and leisurely dinners. Just five minutes away - the center of Tashkent with theaters, museums and cultural spaces
